description:
In this course you will learn all the tips and tricks to make a perfect seafood paella from Valencia. With the guide of Juanry, one of the best rice chefs in Valencia (Spain). His famous restaurant, "El Bolón Verde" is right now in the TOP 5 in VALENCIA in TRIPADVISOR, and is frequented by celebrities from all around the world.

We have created step-by-step videos for you to learn to cook seafood paella perfectly, as if you were beside Juanry in his kitchen. So close you could almost smell the rice.

If you are a professional chef or just like Paella and want to lear to cook perfectly one of the most famous dishes in the world, this is your course!
title: Paella: The Original Recipe Step-By-Step
